did.unittitle: Maurice Hindus papers

repository.corpname: Special Collections and University Archives, Colgate University Libraries

did.langmaterial: Materials primarily in English, Russian, German, and Czech.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item (Author, Title, and Date of item if known)], M2002, Maurice Hindus papers, Special Collections and University Archives, Colgate University Libraries.

separatedmaterial.head: Materials Cataloged Separately
separatedmaterial.p: The Maurice Hindus papers include a number of published volumes. The following volumes have been removed and are cataloged:
The Black Book: The Nazi Crime against the Jewish People. New York, NY: The Jewish Black Book Committee, 1946.
Hindus, Maurice Gerschon.The Great Offensive. New York: H. Smith and R. Haas, 1933.
Hindus, Maurice Gerschon.Green Worlds: An Informal Chronicle. Garden City, NY: Book League of America, 1938.
Hindus, Maurice Gerschon.Humanity Uprooted. New York: J. Cape & H. Smith, 1929. (2 copies)
Hindus, Maurice Gerschon.In Search of a Future; Persia, Egypt, Iraq and Palestine. Garden City, NY: Doubleday, 1949.
Hindus, Maurice Gerschon.Red Bread. New York: J. Cape & H. Smith, 1931.
Samuel, Maurice.The Worlds of Maurice Samuel: Selected Writings. Philadelphia: Jewish Publication Society of America, 1977.
